/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees and bushes on one side and towering power lines on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Cars can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and details of this urban landscape.
